creator: walker_643@yahoo.com
text:
I found this bug after building with --disable-ipv6 and then building a 
subversion with the new apr libraries. This trivial patch keeps an IPV6-only 
procedure call out of a non-IPV6 build.

Cheers :)
Ian


Index: multicast.c
===================================================================
--- multicast.c (revision 491623)
+++ multicast.c (working copy)
@@ -140,7 +140,13 @@
         else
             return APR_ENOTIMPL;
 
+/* 01.01.07:  added check for IPV6
+              find_if_index() is an ipv6-only procedure
+   IW
+*/
+#if APR_HAVE_IPV6
         mip.gsr_interface = find_if_index(iface);
+#endif
         memcpy(&mip.gsr_group, mcast->ipaddr_ptr, sizeof(mip.gsr_group));
         memcpy(&mip.gsr_source, source->ipaddr_ptr, sizeof(mip.gsr_source));

Created attachment 19336
Patch for non-IPV6 builds of APR
creator: walker_643@yahoo.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 39199 ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
